body:
I voted today and I didn't get my xp??? 

Is their a way to fix this????
body_tagged:
I voted today and I didn't get my xp???

title: Voting not working??

replies.body: go to hub then there should be a little thing like this
replies.body_tagged: go to hub then there should be a little thing like this

replies.body: then right click and choose what game u want to get xp for
replies.body_tagged: then right click and choose what game u want to get xp for

replies.body: I know that, I voted and the emerald didn't come to me.
replies.body_tagged: I know that, I voted and the emerald didn't come to me.

reply_to.body: then right click and choose what game u want to get xp for

replies.body: Yah, I've had the exact same problem, creating an issue on github :)
replies.body_tagged: Yah, I've had the exact same problem, creating an issue on github :)

replies.body: Did you do the verification thing and type in your username exactly?
replies.body_tagged: Did you do the verification thing and type in your username exactly?

replies.body: I find the verification thing the hardest thing to do 0_o I mess up at least once almost every time
replies.body_tagged: I find the verification thing the hardest thing to do 0_o I mess up at least once almost every time

replies.body:
If the verification glitched, it would tell you.

Anyway, I've experienced this problem 3 times now. :<
